description: Write a function that parses a URL and extracts the port number. If no port is specified, use 80 for 'http' and 443 for 'https'. Example (Explicit): get_url_port("http://ex.com:8080") -> 8080. Example (Default): get_url_port("https://ex.com") -> 443. Example (Malformed): get_url_port("bad-url") -> -1.
